thread.title: Men Reveal What Makes A Woman 'High Quality'
thread.title_full: Men Reveal What Makes A Woman 'High Quality'

author: Candice Jalili
title: Men Reveal What Makes A Woman 'High Quality'
text:
Like Us On Facebook 
There are lots of things I’d describe as “high quality.” 
Cashmere is a high-quality fabric. A Rolls Royce is a high-quality car. The Paper Mate Profile is a high-quality pen. (Go write with one right now, and tell me I’m wrong.) 
But, you see, these are all things . “ High quality ” is not a way to describe a human being — it’s a way to describe objects. 
Obviously, that doesn’t stop the internet from doing it anyway. Adulting: 20s vs 30s To view this video please enable JavaScript, and considerupgrading to a web browser that supports HTML5 video 
In a recent Reddit thread , men were asked to describe what they picture when they think of a high-quality woman. I know you’re dying to know their answers, so I have them here for you. 
Here’s how to be a high-quality woman, according to a bunch of loser internet trolls: Make like a dog, and do what you’re told! 
Hot and does what she's told. Be young! DO NOT age past 30! 
Under 30, no kids, good relationship with her father, and of course attractive. Thats subjective though
